attributes.action: Disclose the full name of 'Baby P' a.k.a 'Baby Peter'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
While there are genuine child identity issues at stake, there is also the real danger that Baby Peter will be forgotten as another statistic.
We must learn from these horrendous crimes, amend legislation to prevent them happening again.
But before that, the child must be named and a memorial built.
Future generations should never forget the ugly face of humanity, and how a child barely able to speak was allowed to die because others couldn't find their voice.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
